name: The Fright Before Christmas (ChocolateOcelot)
description:
This short text adventure, or interactive fiction if you want to be all modern about it, is set in the world of 7TV, the cult TV miniatures game from Crooked Dice Game Design Studio.

It is very much like the 'choose your own adventure' or 'fighting fantasy' books that I used to play in the 1980s. Except this time you don't need a pencil, paper or a D6. And it is a little harder to cheat by keeping your fingers in the previous pages.

The setting and style of the adventure is very reminiscent of classic British sci-fi TV shows of the 70s and 80s. It is a bit spooky, but not graphic. There are literally no graphics anyway.

Have fun.
